introduction: SYNOPSISIn-chul, a scholar of botany, is climbing a mountain for some research when he meets Jin-suk who lives in a forest cottage. At the request of Jin-suk's father, Sang-do, In-chul stays and lives with them. One day, a snake catcher falls under the temptation of Sang-do and is used as a body for dissection. While probing dubious action of Sang-do, In-chul is captured and locked in the basement. He is to become the subject of a live dissection. In-chul had been suspicious of their behavior and investigating when he was caught. In-chul is lying on a surgery table when he escapes with the help of a young hiker and Jin-suk. Sang-do confesses that he had been suffering from nightmares ever since he was dragged off by the Japanese and forced to perform live dissections. These nightmares have made Sang-do a murderer. After his confession, Sang-do kills himself. In-chul and Jin-suk leave the cottage.故事植物学家incheol是否满足jinsuk伊朗妇女攀上高山植物的山josacha研究。Jinsuk不得不住在树林与他的父亲分辨率incheol山寨也该决议的要求，生活。Jinsuk分辨率有一天ttangkkun杀incheol也有未遂逃跑的地下室被用作活体解剖的对象分辨率的诱惑捕获结束。Incheol现在incheol这是考试科目获得在手术台上，也同时挖掘他们的行为抓到嫌疑人。但随着徒步旅行者年轻人和jinsuk incheol出现的帮助是逃避奖项是他们所收到被带到了日本军方的噩梦会承认自己的命运hakbyeong强迫性的医疗实验的受害者以自己现在的凶手哀叹，和垂死的自己。Incheol jinsuk离开这座山被捆绑与意志的爱。
